meanings.definition: A condition characterized by an increase in the number of eosinophils in the blood or tissues.
meanings.sent1: The eosinophilias in his blood indicated a possible allergic reaction.
meanings.sent2: Doctors diagnosed her with eosinophilias after conducting blood tests.
meanings.sent3: The eosinophilias in his body were throwing a party, causing quite a commotion.
meanings.sent4: Her eosinophilias were like an army of defenders, ready to fight off any invaders.
meanings.sent5: The eosinophilias swarmed through his system like eager helpers, trying to restore balance.

meanings.definition: The presence of an abnormally high number of eosinophils in the body.
meanings.sent1: The doctor confirmed the eosinophilias in her system were causing the symptoms.
meanings.sent2: Eosinophilias can sometimes indicate a parasitic infection in the body.
meanings.sent3: The eosinophilias in his body were having a dance-off, much to the confusion of the other cells.
meanings.sent4: Her eosinophilias stood out like bright stars in a dark sky, signaling trouble.
meanings.sent5: The eosinophilias seemed to multiply rapidly, like an unstoppable force within her body.
